Crypto banks are Bitcoin sidechains  But they are also Ethereum & Litecoin & Zcash sidechains  They are not a moat for BTC  But DeFi protocols are part of the Ethereum mainchain  They can’t serve other chains, assets must come to them  They are a moat for ETH
